intro.description: We are going to quickly add a data layer to uDig by dragging a file from out of the file system onto the workbench, uDig will process the file for us and add it to the map.

item.title: File System
item.description: In your file system locate your data folder that contained some spatial data.

item.title: Drag a File
item.description:
Drag a spatial file onto your map.
Example: NE1_50M_SR_W.tif

item.title: Layer Added
item.description: You will see a new layer has been added to your map. It will be the top most layer on the map.
